name: POLI 174
title: Global Political Ecology
description: Explores the global dimensions of complex environmental issues such as climate change, biodiversity, deforestation, and fisheries: how they are produced, how they manifest, and how they are governed in response.

conditions.restricted_to_majors: politics and Latin American and Latino studies/politics combined majors during first and second pass enrollment.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to politics and Latin American and Latino studies/politics combined majors during first and second pass enrollment.
